content.title: Modify Default testPlan
content.body:
1. From Project Explorer, expand Test Resources > Jasmine > Mobile > Test Plans and open the testPlan.js file.
  2. Replace the code in the file with the following code:
    require(["Test Plans/ RecipientsApp"]);
    /* Write the name of a test plan to execute.
    Here, RecipientsApp is the name of the Test plan.*/
    require([],function(){require([], function(){require([], function(){jasmine.getEnv().execute(); });});});
  3. Save the file.
